participant_1.background:
I am looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work.
I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love.
i am witty.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
I start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit.

participant_2.background:
The weather is not usually a factor when I am outside looking for wildlife.
i enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't.
I remember watching the Olympics with my family and dreaming of being an Olympian myself.
my favorite band is radiolead.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Hey there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm a vet student, so I'm excited to start my career helping animals.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I'm a wildlife biologist, so I get to spend my days outside looking for animals.
That sounds like a really fun job! I bet you get to see a lot of cool wildlife.
I do! I love seeing all the different animals that live in our area.
What's your favorite animal?
I think my favorite animal is the red-tailed hawk. They're so majestic and powerful.
I love red-tailed hawks too! They're really cool birds.
Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Shadow. He's a black cat with green eyes.
Aww, I love black cats! They're so cute.
They are! Shadow is a great pet. He's really cuddly and loves to play.
Sounds like a great cat.
He is! I'm really glad I have him.
Me too! It's nice to have a furry friend to keep you company.
It is! I love having Shadow around.
I'm glad you're happy with him.
Thanks! I am.
Great! Well, it was nice talking to you. I have to go now, but I hope to talk to you again soon.
You too! It was nice talking to you. Bye!
Bye!
